mapper.select: select c.comment_score,c.comment_tag,c.comment_content,s.share_id from np_comment c LEFT join np_share s on s.order_goods_id=c.order_goods_id where c.order_goods_id=#{orderGoodsId} and c.customer_id=#{customerId} order by c.order_goods_id desc limit 0,1

SELECT i.goods_info_name,i.goods_info_id,g.order_goods_id,g.comment_id,i.goods_info_item_no,c.comment_tag from np_order o INNER JOIN np_order_goods g on g.order_id = o.order_id INNER JOIN np_goods_info i on i.goods_info_id = g.goods_info_id inner join np_comment c on c.comment_id = g.comment_id where o.customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and i.goods_info_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and o.order_id =#{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
